item.title: srael says it's begun daily pauses in fighting in parts of Gaza to let aid in
item.description: The local pause in fighting came days after ceasefire efforts between Israel and Hamas appeared to be in doubt.

item.title: How Trump wants the US to cash in on mineral-rich DR Congo's peace deal

item.title: US-EU tariff deal a big Trump win but not a total defeat for Brussels
